thread.section_title: Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Romantic
thread.title_full: Romantic - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Robert B
title: Romantic
text: This review is way overdue! The first time I came here was November 2014 and was pleasantly surprised to find out that some of the rooms have patios!! There's nothing like being in the middle of Manhattan in a decent hotel room, not overly expensive, that has outdoor patio! There's even grass! This is a great secret in Manhattan and I just gave it away! My girlfriend will beat me if the next time she tries to get one of the rooms and can't because of a review by me! A big plus! By the way, the breakfast is also pretty decent along with the staff makes this Manhattan hotel an enjoyable stay!
